subject: Paralympic Games
Awards, Decorations and Honors
Track and Field
lead_paragraph: Oscar Pistorius, the South African double amputee known as the Blade Runner, finished in 47.49 seconds, a world record for his disability class.
snippet: Oscar Pistorius, the South African double amputee known as the Blade Runner, finished in 47.49 seconds, a world record for his disability class.
